cards.question: Did these flashcards help you pass your exam?
cards.answer: Great! Consider buying Ben a coffee ☕ - his PayPal probably needs more love than his code does!

cards.question: Want to support this free flashcard app?
cards.answer: PayPal: your-paypal@email.com - Because servers cost money but dad jokes are free! 💸

cards.question: How much should I donate?
cards.answer: Whatever you think this saved you in exam prep costs! Even $1 helps keep the lights on 💡

cards.question: What happens if I don't donate?
cards.answer: Nothing! The app stays free. But Ben's coffee fund gets sadder ☕😢

cards.question: Is this donation request annoying?
cards.answer: Probably! But less annoying than paying $300 for exam prep courses 🤷‍♂️
